document_text: This Service Agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into as of January 1, 2025 between ABC Corporation ("Provider") and XYZ Inc. ("Client"). Provider agrees to provide software development services as described in Exhibit A. Client shall pay Provider $50,000 per month for services rendered. This Agreement shall commence on January 1, 2025 and continue for 12 months unless terminated earlier. Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice.
ground_truth_summary: Service agreement between ABC Corporation and XYZ Inc. for software development services at $50,000/month for 12 months starting January 2025, with 30-day termination notice.

document_text: Non-Disclosure Agreement. This Agreement is made between TechStart LLC ("Disclosing Party") and ConsultCo ("Receiving Party"). Confidential Information includes all technical data, trade secrets, and business information. Receiving Party agrees to: 1) Hold information in confidence, 2) Not disclose to third parties, 3) Use only for evaluation purposes. This agreement expires 3 years from signing. Governing law: State of California.
ground_truth_summary: NDA between TechStart LLC and ConsultCo covering technical and business information. Key obligations include confidentiality and limited use. 3-year term under California law.

document_text: Invoice #2025-001. From: Digital Solutions Inc., 123 Tech Lane, Seattle WA 98101. To: Global Enterprises, 456 Business Ave, New York NY 10001. Date: January 15, 2025. Items: Web Development Services - $15,000, Mobile App Development - $25,000, Cloud Infrastructure Setup - $10,000. Total: $50,000. Payment Due: February 15, 2025. Bank: First National Bank, Account: 123456789.

LEASE AGREEMENT. Landlord: Property Management LLC. Tenant: John Smith. Property: Unit 5A, 789 Oak Street, Apartment Building, Portland OR 97201. Monthly Rent: $2,500 due on the 1st. Security Deposit: $5,000. Lease Term: January 1, 2025 - December 31, 2025. Utilities: Tenant responsible for electricity and gas. Landlord provides water and garbage. Pet Policy: One cat or small dog allowed with $500 pet deposit.
ground_truth_summary: Residential lease for Unit 5A at 789 Oak Street, Portland. $2,500/month rent with $5,000 security deposit. 12-month term in 2025. Tenant pays electric/gas; pets allowed with deposit.

document_text: Employment Offer Letter. We are pleased to offer you the position of Senior Software Engineer at InnovateTech Corp. Start Date: February 1, 2025. Salary: $175,000 annually, paid bi-weekly. Benefits: Health, dental, vision insurance; 401(k) with 6% match; 20 days PTO. Stock Options: 10,000 shares vesting over 4 years. Reporting to: VP of Engineering. This offer expires January 20, 2025.
ground_truth_summary: Employment offer for Senior Software Engineer at InnovateTech. $175K salary, comprehensive benefits including 401(k) match and stock options. Reports to VP Engineering.
